mapper.insert: insert into deploy_env_version ( env_id, version_id, build_no, lcu, lcd ) values ( #{envId}, #{versionId}, #{buildNo}, #{lcu}, now(3) ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE version_id = #{versionId}, build_no = #{buildNo}, lcu = #{lcu}, lcd = now(3)
insert into deploy_env_version_audit ( id, env_id, version_id, build_no, operate, fcu, fcd ) values ( #{id}, #{envId}, #{versionId}, #{buildNo}, #{operate}, #{fcu}, now(3) )
